input.name: __VIEWSTATE
__EVENTVALIDATION

div.span: All Upper Arlington Schools facilities are closed to visitors through the end of the 2019-2020 school year. Any previously scheduled events or activities, including athletics, are postponed or canceled until then as well. Please visit www.uaschools.org for more information on COVID-19 updates and precautions.

1950 North Mallway Drive
Upper Arlington, OH 43221
Hours: 7:30 a.m. to 4:00 p.m. Monday-Friday
Phone: (614) 487-5000
© 2020. Upper Arlington Schools. All Rights Reserved.
